task.title: How to Share Your Screen
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to share your screen.

taskbody.prereq: To be able to share your screen, first you need to have joined a voice channel.

context.p: You can share your screen with everyone in the voice channel that you are in.

step.cmd: Navigate to the voice channel panel.
Press the screen button in the voice status panel - a new window will pop out.
Select an individual application window to share, or select an entire screen.
Press the Go Live button at the buttom of the window when you are ready to share your screen.

taskbody.result: You are now sharing your screen.
